definition: to burn/to ignite/to light/fig. to spark off (hopes)/to start (debate)/to raise (hopes)

sentences.english: The invention simultaneously provides an internal-combustion engine and a compressor using the movable shaft.
sentences.chinese: 本發明同時提供使用上述動軸的內燃機和壓縮機。

sentences.english: What happens is that the car’s internal combustion engine is a kind of chemical factory on a small scale.
sentences.chinese: 橋車內燃機實際上是一座小型化工廠。

sentences.english: The present invention is an aftertreatment system for lean burn internal combustion engines.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及一種稀燃式內燃機的後處理系統。

sentences.english: Internal-combustion engines are by nature high-friction devices.
sentences.chinese: 內燃機是自然的高摩擦裝置。

sentences.english: Influence of Element Length on the Modal Calculation Accuracy of I. C. E.
sentences.chinese: 單元尺寸對內燃機模態計算精度的影響。

sentences.english: The steam locomotives were superseded by diesel units.
sentences.chinese: 蒸汽機車已被柴油內燃機車所取代。

sentences.english: Two-axial tilting test rigs are employed in combustion engine development.
sentences.chinese: 兩軸傾斜測試臺架通常用於內燃機開發中。

sentences.english: An electric vehicle is controlled to conform its operation to that of a conventional internal-combustion-engine powered vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 一種電動車輛，其操縱相同於通常的內燃機車輛。

sentences.english: And it must save the world from the internal combustion engine.
sentences.chinese: 但它必須同時也要把世界從內燃機手下解救出來。

sentences.english: Done the bench test with the proper proportion emulsified diesel oil as automotive fuel.
sentences.chinese: 將適當比例的乳化柴油作爲內燃機燃料做了臺架試驗。

sentences.english: It also sums up the developing conditions of diesel locomotives in China and puts up some suggestions.
sentences.chinese: 概述了我國內燃機車發展現狀，並提出了建議。

sentences.english: It is the professional manufacturer of diesel locomotive of railroad drawing motivation.
sentences.chinese: 是鐵路牽引動力內燃機車的專業生產廠。

sentences.english: Ideal cleaning internal combustion engine parts of ash.
sentences.chinese: 能較理想的清洗內燃機各部位的積灰。

sentences.english: There are different kinds of internal combustion engines.
sentences.chinese: 內燃機引擎有各種不同的類型。

sentences.english: Aluminum-based piston enchased wearing ring is a development direction of high-powered gas engine.
sentences.chinese: 鋁基活塞鑲嵌耐磨圈是大功率內燃機的一個發展方向。

sentences.english: This paper point out the new development trend of engine air filter paper - lower basisweight.
sentences.chinese: 闡明瞭內燃機空氣過濾紙的低定量化發展方向。

pinyin: zi4 ran2 yu3 yan2 chu3 li3

definition: to cut ties/to disconnect/out of touch
